The NoW won newspaper of year at British Press Awards in March 2005, when Andy Coulson apparently sought to sum up his approach to editing as he accepted the award, saying: The News of the World doesn't pretend to do anything other than reveal big stories and titillate and entertain the public, while exposing crime and hypocrisy.
